## Leaflet map

```{r, warning=FALSE, fig.cap="Location of Santiago Bernabeu Stadium "}
library(leaflet)
rmIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "ball.png",
  iconWidth = 50, iconHeight = 50,
  iconAnchorX = 50/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addMarkers(icon = rmIcon, lat=40.4530541, lng=-3.6905278) %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```
